proof_steps.statement: ⟨g, h_gen⟩ := inst₁, where h_gen : ∀ x : G, ∃ k : ℤ, x = g ^ k.
⟨m, h_a⟩ := h_gen a, so h_a : a = g ^ m.
⟨n, h_b⟩ := h_gen b, so h_b : b = g ^ n.

proof_steps.claim: a * b = g ^ m * g ^ n
proof_steps.label: h1

proof_steps.claim: g ^ m * g ^ n = g ^ (m + n)
proof_steps.label: h2

proof_steps.claim: g ^ (n + m) = g ^ n * g ^ m
proof_steps.label: h4

calculation_sequence: a * b = g ^ m * g ^ n
g ^ m * g ^ n = g ^ (m + n)
g ^ (n + m) = g ^ n * g ^ m
g ^ n * g ^ m = b * a
